rules_text: {5}{W}: Transform Fanatical Fanartist. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature in your sentai. [i](A sentai is up to one creature of each color.)[/i]
flavor_text2: [i]Meeting her heroes was everything she hoped it would be. But over time she began to wonder what her familiar chose her for. Maybe she was just an easy mark, a gullible fan who could easily be convinced to risk her life.[/i]
